meanings.sent1: After the previous tenant left, the landlord rerented the apartment to a new tenant.
meanings.sent2: The vacation home was rerented to a family for the summer season.
meanings.sent3: The bicycle was rerented so many times that it started feeling like a celebrity on wheels.
meanings.sent4: The rerented house welcomed new occupants, breathing life into its empty rooms.
meanings.sent5: The car was rerented so frequently that it almost seemed to have a revolving door for drivers.

meanings.sent1: The property manager rerented the office space to a new business after the previous lease expired.
meanings.sent2: The landlord rerented the house to a young couple looking for a cozy home.
meanings.sent3: The rerented boat became the talk of the marina, with everyone curious about its new adventures.
meanings.sent4: The rerented storefront transformed into a bustling hub of activity, attracting customers from all around.
meanings.sent5: The apartment was rerented so quickly that it seemed to have a magnetic charm for potential tenants.
